attributes.action: Stop Members of Parliment claiming ridiculous expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop MP'S Claiming ridiculous amounts of expenses even though they are paid a salary. 
It is highly inappropiate that in todays economic climate with the public loosing their houses and unable to afford the now extortionate cost of living that we financially support the living costs of MPS AND pay them an extremely Generous salary.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
